screen_desc: The screenshot shows the settings for Picture-in-Picture features on Google Play services. It displays the version number and allows users to enable or disable the feature for the app.
action_think: The user wants to turn off Picture-in-Picture for Google Play services. The toggle switch for Picture-in-Picture is currently off, so no further actions are needed.
action_result: By clicking on the back button, we moved to the previous screen where we can see the list of apps that are allowed to have picture-in-picture feature, including Google Play services. This action helps us to complete the user request of turning off picture-in-picture, because we can now enable or disable this feature for each app individually.
